|#8 | Chaos Insurgency | HP: 120 |
|#9 | SCP-096 | HP: 2000 |
|#10 | SCP-049-2 | HP: 400 |

|#13 | Nine-Tailed Fox Cadet | HP: 100 |

|#15 | Facility Guard | HP: 100 |
